price: “Hin sodaatin, Nuti ilma beekaa ta’een si gammachiifnaa” jedhan.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَا تَوۡجَلۡ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَٰمٍ عَلِيمٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qālū lā tawjal innā nubashiruka bighulāmin ʿalīmin
